alert.note: Alert for Kinney (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 14 at 10:29PM CDT until April 14 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KINNEY COUNTY... At 1029 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alamo Village, or 8 miles north of Brackettville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Brackettville, Alamo Village and Turkey Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
